name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader”
”Tell Haiku Reader to read me a haiku”
”Ask Haiku Reader to read me a poem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: Haiku Reader is an easy skill that provides haikus randomly. You can ask Haiku Reader for a poem or haiku whenever you want.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
